section.title: AUT Agent
section.para: Although the automatic AUT Agent selection generally selects the correct AUT Agent, it can be useful to know what criteria go into the selection process. These rules are followed when deciding with which AUT Agent the starting AUT should be registered:

listitem.para: If the ITE is currently connected to an AUT Agent, then that AUT Agent will be used.
If an embedded AUT Agent is running, the ITE will connect to the embedded AUT Agent and use that for AUT registration.
An embedded AUT Agent will be started, and the connection will be made and used for AUT registration.
